    • row2object

      public Flights row2object(ResultSet rs) throws FlightBookingException
      This method maps the data from a ResultSet to a Flights object. It retrieves the data for each column of the Flights table and sets it to the corresponding field of the Flights object.
      Specified by:
      row2object in class AbstractDao<Flights>
      Parameters:
      rs - a ResultSet object representing a row in the Flights table
      Returns:
      a Flights object with data from the ResultSet
      Throws:
      FlightBookingException - if a database access error occurs
